covered_in_class:
We kicked off Special Arabic this week by doing a quick knowledge check of what students knew.
Next, we worked on the first 7 letters of the Arabic Alphabet, working on writing, recognition, and pronunciation.
Letters covered were: (ا،ب،ت،ث،ج،ح،خ)
Some students needed extra practice with certain letters, so they only covered the first 3 letters (ا،ب،ت) (they will only need to do the 1st 3 letters for homework)

notes_contents.label: Letters and How to Pronounce them
